attributes.action: Investigate the tendering process undertaken by the East Midlands Development Agency to select a single provider for the new regional Business Link service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Request that the East Midlands Development Agency make public the criteria used in the tendering process for a new regional Business Link service. Their response should include the reasoning and justification to why the contract was awarded to East Midlands Business Ltd and feedback on the tenders submitted by the other three shortlisted organisations.
